## 5.1: Functions of a continuous random variable

- $X$ - CRV, with CDF $F_X$ and PDF $f_X$

    $Y = g(X)$, with CDF $F_Y$, such that
    $$F_y(y) = P(Y \leq y) = P(g(X) \leq y) = P(X \in \{x:g(x) \leq y\})$$

- For monotonic, differentiable functions $Y=g(X)$:

    $$f_Y(y) = \frac{1}{\left | g'(g^{-1}(y)) \right|} \cdot f_X(g^{-1}(y)) $$
